title: Hampering With the Evidence
description: Katherine would like to pack for short trips in a laundry basket. But her husband, Andy, says it’s not practical! Who’s right? Who’s wrong?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
